InstructionData.Title: minesWithCentrifuge
InstructionData.Author: Anders142536
InstructionData.Instructions:
# WIP # deep miner -> centrifuges -> arc furnace -> vending machine
# Setup alias dSensor d0 alias dConsole d1
alias rRatio r0 alias rBatteryOutput r1 alias rHorizontal r2 alias rVertical r3
define debugValue db Setting define Battery HASH("StructureBattery") define Solar HASH("StructureSolarPanelReinforced") define Centrifuge HASH("StructureCentrifuge") define ArcFurnace HASH("StructureArcFurnace")
dConsole Mode 3
loop: debugValue 1
jal manageSolarPanels jal displayCurrentPowerUsage
lb rRatio Battery Ratio Average bltal rRatio 0.2 stopArcFurnace bgtal
# done sleep 1 j loop
manageSolarPanels: debugValue 2 l rHorizontal dSensor Horizontal l rVertical dSensor Vertical
# these have to be set based on daylight sensor direction or the daylight # sensor adjusted add rHorizontal rHorizontal 90 add rVertical rVertical 90
sb Solar Horizontal rHorizontal sb Solar Vertical rVertical j ra
displayCurrentPowerUsage: debugValue 3 lb rBatteryOutput Battery PowerActual Sum s dConsole Setting rBatteryOutput j ra
stopArcFurnace: debugvalue 4 s ArcFurnace On 0 j ra
startArcFurnace: debugvalue 5 s ArcFurnace On 1 j ra
